channel.title: I need help...I wanna make a server, and i dont know anything!
channel.description: im h4xx0rz, and after finding no unqueness in servers i decided to make my owns server. I don't know the first thing about making my own server lol. I downloaded SCAR, but i dont know what to do after that! can someoen please help me on this matter lol. thank you.

item.title: I need help...I wanna make a server, and i dont know anything!

item.description:

yes, scar is not needed for a server, SCAR is used for SCAR Scripts ;D

item.title: I need help...I wanna make a server, and i dont know anything!
item.dc:creator: @cccrrraaazzziii cccrrraaazzziii
item.description:
@cccrrraaazzziii wrote:

First off, you don’t download SCAR. I think you should a look here:

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,37596.0.html

This is a basic guide on how to get a server going.
